Posts.Content: Rene2000 wrote: Is anyone in a phase I or II study of CR011-vcMMAE? It is a new combination drug composed of a monoclonal antibody bound with a cytotoxic agent. It has been used in melanoma and more recently with breast ca mets. I would be interested in hearing anyone's experience. Thank you guys so much. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone on this trial? Rene2000 Rene2000

Posts.Content: Rene2000 wrote: It seems stem cell transplants and high dose chemotherapy are a thing of the past. Does anyone know the research on stem cells? A friend of mine who is a medical doctor says he thinks stem cells will one day be the future in finding a cure for mets? Just wanted your thoughts on this since stem cells are once again being nationally discussed. Log in to post a reply
